title: Prawn, black rice, avocado & mango salad

ingredients.item: ½ Waitrose 1 Perfectly Ripe Mango, stone and skin removed, cubed
½ Waitrose 1 Perfectly Ripe Avocado, cubed
2.5cm piece of fresh ginger, peeled and grated

instructions.step: Cook the rice according to pack instructions, then drain. Meanwhile, whisk together the dressing ingredients.
Place the rice in a large bowl with the prawns, cucumber, mango and avocado. Pour over the dressing and toss then season to taste.
Divide between 2 bowls and then top with sesame seeds, chilli flakes and onion before serving.
